---
name: "create-issue"
description: "Draft a well-scoped GitLab issue with labels, milestones, and ownership."
---

# Create GitLab Issue

Collect the details below, confirm with the user, then create or draft the issue via MCP if allowed.

- Confirm GitLab host/namespace/project; use the configured default host/group if none is provided and decline cross-project requests.

## Required
- Project/group
- Title
- Type/labels (bug/feature/chore) and severity/priority
- Summary and acceptance criteria

## Optional
- Milestone, due date, assignee, related issues/MRs, attachments/links

## Output
- Short issue draft with sections: Summary, Steps/Context, Expected vs Actual (for bugs), Acceptance Criteria, Labels/Milestone/Assignee.
- If write access is approved, list the MCP tool call parameters before sending.
